thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Interesting small hotel
thread.title_full: Interesting small hotel - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: EnAreJay
title: Interesting small hotel
text: Very modern hotel. It feels more like checking into a small apartment building. The room was small, but clean and comfortable. The location can't be beat. The palace mews is about 100 yds away, and Buckingham Palace is a 1/4 mile walk. The staff is great. They have good working relationships with local restaurants and a limousine service. There is no restaurant in the hotel, which could be a mark against them, but it's London. There are lots of restaurants.
